范仲淹.definition: Fan Zhongyan (989-1052), Song dynasty scholar and politician, author of On Yueyang Tower 岳陽樓記|岳阳楼记[Yue4yang2 Lou2 Ji4]

范公偁.definition: Fan Gongcheng (12th century), Southern Song author of 過庭錄|过庭录

范斯坦.definition: Dianne Feinstein (1933-), US Senator from California

范瑋琪.definition: Christine Fan (1976-), American-born Taiwanese singer and actress
